title: A question about Riven vs Garen
body: I know that Garen can counter Riven quite easily, provided that he is being used properly, I am just wondering if the Riven has both exhaust and ignite spells would there be a chance for Riven to win the trade from level 6 onwards, or is it more likely that Riven and Garen will both die in this case?

replies.body: Pretty sure you can dumpster any champ if you exhaust and ignite them, but even if you take out Garen, if he comes back with a sunfire he will continue to win trades.

this thread is a massive lul
merry christmas

It's better to have short trades and run with Garen, the longer you are fighting with him, the less likely you are to win, it's better to just farm up and ask your jungler for a gank. 
But to be perfectly honest here, i do not suggest playing riven, she's a really hard champion to play, if you want some good top lane champions, i suggest you play these 3 champs,  Darius, Trundle and malphite, i would not suggest playing any other top laners untill you reach about high plat- low diamond , and even then, after that trundle is still good to play even until challenger.

I don't own Riven yet, but I do own Garen, and I did kill Riven using him.
I don't own either Darius, Trundle, or Malphite, I may get these champions in the future.
The reason that I asked this question is that the answer to this question may help me if I use Garen to fight a Riven who has both exhaust and ignite.
So far, I only used Riven in Coop vs Al when she's free.
I wouldn't use Riven in pvp unless if I have no choice but to do so. If I had to use her, I would use her in either mid or jungle. I can't risk myself using Riven in top lane since it would be most likely for me to get killed, unless if I am really experienced at her, but even then I cannot guarantee that I will not lose to my opponent.
There are some champions that Riven can definitely counter, but since I never know who I am going to play against (except if I am in ranked, which I haven't played yet), I would not use her. I will use Riven in a custom game if other people asked me advice on how to counter her, just to help them so that they will gain experience on countering her.
